notes: This dataset contains resources that will help the user to improve its skills in capacity development in the context of climate change.

resources.name: Catalogue of Knowledge Management (KM) and Decision Support (DS) methods, tools and products on Sustainable Land and Water Management
resources.description: This catalogue was prepared to help Sustainable Land Management (SLM) â€“ User Needs Survey respondents to familiarize themselves with the existing KM and DS methods, tools and products produced over the last 30 years by The Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations (FAO), its Land Degradation Assessment in Drylands Programme (LADA) and the World Overview of Conservation Approaches and Technologies (WOCAT).

This course provides the necessary knowledge to design, develop and implement agricultural projects and programmes that address the challenges of a changing climate. It is useful for professionals working in agricultural development who need to learn how to mainstream effectively climate change considerations in their projects and programmes.
resources.name: Incorporating Climate Change considerations into agricultural investment programmes

groups.name: climate-change-mitigation
groups.description: If the global food supply is to keep pace with population growth and dietary changes, agricultural productivity must increase. Changes in agricultural practices can help the world not only to meet its targets for reducing greenhouse gas emissions but also to contribute to food security.
groups.title: Climate Change Mitigation

groups.name: climate-change-adaptation
groups.description: Climate change threatens our ability to ensure global food security, eradicate poverty and achieve sustainable development. Greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions from human activity and livestock are a significant driver of climate change, trapping heat in the earth's atmosphere and triggering global warming.
groups.title: Climate change adaptation and resilience

name: learning-on-capacity-development-and-climate-change
title: Learning on capacity development and climate change

organization.title: FAO
organization.description: Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations
organization.name: fao
